name: Joe's Adventure That Apparently Includes Jumping On Buildings
name_original: Joe's Adventure That Apparently Includes Jumping On Buildings
description:
My submission for the BlackThornProd game jam #3.

Don't know what else to write for now so banana. I will replace this with a proper description later. But, you should know that coins weigh you down and reduce your score, so you should probably avoid them. Also if you get too much you explode for some reason. Do not worry though, you can run into spikes to lose weight. Pay attention to your health bar as well, or you will also explode. (What's with the explosions!?)

Controls:
Press Space
Credits:
Drum samples from Bitkits by Uppercussion
Sound effects made in Bfxr
